consumer_rights.2: Right to be protected against marketing of hazardous goods and services
consumer_rights.3: Right to be informed about quality, quantity, potency, purity, standard and price
consumer_rights.4: Right to be assured access to variety of goods at competitive prices
consumer_rights.5: Right to be heard and assured that consumer interests receive due consideration
consumer_rights.6: Right to seek redressal against unfair trade practices or exploitation

unfair_trade_practices.11: False representation that goods are of particular standard, quality or grade
unfair_trade_practices.12: False representation about price or discount

unfair_trade_practices.14: Conducting contests without disclosing terms and conditions
unfair_trade_practices.15: Bait advertising - advertising goods at low price without intent to sell

e_commerce.31: Mandatory disclosure of country of origin

e_commerce.34: Consumer right to return goods within specified period
